ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Somethin seems wrong
ygData.msgSnippet: Stick to scalers until they are trivial, then do lanterns until trivial, then do skewers till trivial.  By then you ll be poppin out the banded pretty easy.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Stick to scalers until they are trivial, then do lanterns until trivial,
then do skewers till trivial. By then you'll be poppin out the banded
pretty easy. I started making gorgets and bracers around 60 with around a
50% success rate. I sold them for 6pp and 8pp each (or a pair of bracers
for 14pp) which normally netted me enough cash to make more skewers.

Draethar
High Elf Enchanter
Master Smith, Innoruk Server

>ok I am a 27 skill smith, I have been 27 for a while, I have sharpened 13
>weapons, made 3 studs, 5 lanterns, 7 bonings, and I havent gained a single
>skill point, what could be the problem
